DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate bioequivalence single oral dose 2 different drug form TAK-536 pediatric formulation single oral dose TAK-536 commercial tablet healthy Japanese adult male participant .
DOC.brief_title: A Bioequivalence Study TAK-536 Pediatric Formulation
DOC.detailed_description: This study design evaluate bioequivalence single oral dose 2 different drug form TAK-536 pediatric formulation ( dry syrup , granule ) single oral dose TAK-536 commercial tablet use open-label , 2 Ã— 2 crossover design .
